text:
#Bangladesh’s nationwide #Covid19 #vaccination drive picking up pace: Total no. of #vaccine recipients so far 3,37,769; today, 158,451 people were #vaccinated incl. 30 diplomats and reps of int’l orgs stationed in #Dhaka and their spouses. 
See: https://t.co/t2bI7qutOw https://t.co/cGpYPjsS5F
